bibl.title: A Greek Legend to a Sculptured Monument from Tell Atrib, Lower Egypt.
bibl.note: Piece of limestone, found in the 1990 season, in the eastern sector of the excavations, to the south-east of the Kom proper, with a four-line Greek inscription: "(This is) the monument made of white stone (representing) Apollonios and Ammonios." 1st cent. B.C./1st cent. A.D.
LAJTAR Adam, A Greek Legend to a Sculptured Monument from Tell Atrib, Lower Egypt.
